title: [Vornavian Coast, Beached Hulk]
description: The bow of the ship lies to the northeast, overlooking the beach and the pine woods beyond the dunes.  The wind and stars are magnificent, and the view of the moonlit beach is breathtaking.  The deck continues southwest to the stern, and the foremast rises high above the deck.

The bow of the ship lies to the northeast, overlooking the beach and the pine woods beyond the dunes.  Seagulls perch on the rails that border the deck.  The wind and sun are magnificent, and the view of the beach is breathtaking.  The deck continues southwest to the stern, and the foremast rises high above the deck.
